propDescriptions.children: In most cases will simply be a string containing a title for the label.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.error: If true, the step is marked as failed.
propDescriptions.icon: Override the default label of the step icon.
propDescriptions.StepIconComponent: The component to render in place of the StepIcon.

active.description: Pseudo-class applied to the `Typography` component if `active={true}`.

completed.description: Pseudo-class applied to the `Typography` component if `completed={true}`.

error.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element and `Typography` component if `error={true}`.

disabled.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element and `Typography` component if `disabled={true}`.

alternativeLabel.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root and icon container and `Typography` if `alternativeLabel={true}`.
